intro.title: Once Upon a Kingdom
story: In a distant kingdom, there lived a wise king and a beautiful princess.
The kingdom was prosperous, but an ancient curse threatened its peace.
You are the chosen one, destined to break the curse and save the kingdom.

options.text: Decline the quest and live a peaceful life

castle_gate.title: Journey to the Enchanted Castle
story: You set out on a journey towards the Enchanted Castle where the curse originated.
The path is treacherous, but you encounter helpful creatures along the way.
As you approach the castle gate, an old sorcerer appears, offering guidance.

options.text: Ignore the sorcerer and enter the castle

sorcerer_advice.title: Sorcerer's Wisdom
story: The sorcerer warns of dangers within the castle and advises caution.
He gives you a magical amulet that will protect you from dark forces.
Armed with the amulet, you proceed further into the Enchanted Castle.

options.text: Head straight to the castle tower

castle_hallway.title: The Castle Hallway
story: Ignoring the sorcerer's advice, you enter the castle hallway.
Shadows dance on the walls, and mysterious whispers fill the air.
You come across two doorsâ€”one leads to the left and the other to the right.

courtyard_encounter.title: Courtyard Encounter
story: In the castle courtyard, you encounter a mischievous fairy.
The fairy challenges you to a riddle to prove your worthiness.
Answer correctly, and the fairy may aid you on your quest.

options.text: Bypass the fairy and continue to the tower

fairy_riddle.title: Fairy's Riddle
story: The fairy presents a riddle: 'I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?'
Choose your answer wisely, for the fairy's assistance may be crucial on your journey.

fairy_help.title: Fairy's Assistance
story: Congratulations! Your correct answer impresses the fairy.
The fairy grants you a magical boon, enhancing your abilities.
With newfound strength, you continue your journey through the Enchanted Castle.

fairy_challenge.title: Fairy's Challenge
story: Unfortunately, your answer is incorrect, and the fairy challenges you to a magical duel.
Overcoming the fairy's tricks requires skill and wit.
If you succeed, the fairy may still offer assistance. Fail, and the journey becomes more perilous.

options.text: Attempt to flee from the fairy

duel_success.title: Victorious Duel
story: Through clever tactics and quick thinking, you emerge victorious in the magical duel.
Impressed by your skills, the fairy decides to aid you on your quest.
Together, you continue the journey towards the castle tower.

duel_failure.title: Failed Escape
story: Fleeing from the fairy proves futile, as its magic overpowers your attempts to escape.
The fairy, though amused, decides to observe your journey without offering assistance.
Undeterred, you press on, knowing the challenges ahead have grown more daunting.

options.text: Continue the journey without the fairy's aid

tower_stairs.title: Ascending the Tower Stairs
story: As you ascend the tower stairs, you feel the weight of the ancient curse growing stronger.
The air becomes thick with magic, and ghostly whispers echo through the stone walls.
At the top of the stairs, you stand before a grand doorway leading to the heart of the curse.

options.text: Take a moment to prepare before entering

cursed_chamber.title: The Cursed Chamber
story: Entering the cursed chamber, you confront the source of the ancient curse.
Dark energy swirls around a mysterious artifact, and a shadowy figure appears before you.
The figure reveals the only way to break the curse is through a sacrifice of true love.

options.text: Declare your love for the princess

love_declared.title: Declaration of Love
story: With courage in your heart, you declare your love for the princess.
The ancient curse begins to unravel, and the kingdom is bathed in a warm, golden light.
The princess, once trapped in an eternal slumber, awakens with gratitude in her eyes.

options.text: Embrace the princess and enjoy a new beginning

alternative_solution.title: Search for an Alternative Solution
story: Choosing not to sacrifice love, you search for an alternative solution.
Guided by wisdom and compassion, you discover a forgotten spell that weakens the curse's grip.
The kingdom is saved, and the princess is freed from the curse's shackles.

options.text: Celebrate the victory with the princess

preparation_room.title: Preparation Room
story: Taking a moment to prepare, you find a room filled with ancient artifacts and potions.
Each item has a unique property that may aid you in the upcoming confrontation.
Choose wisely, for the curse's power is strong, and the princess's fate hangs in the balance.

enchanted_sword.title: Enchanted Sword
story: Equipping the enchanted sword, you feel its magical energy coursing through your veins.
With the sword in hand, you enter the cursed chamber ready to face the shadowy figure.

options.text: Confront the shadowy figure with the enchanted sword

protection_potion.title: Protection Potion
story: Consuming the protection potion, you sense an invisible shield surrounding you.
With heightened defenses, you enter the cursed chamber prepared for the upcoming battle.

options.text: Confront the shadowy figure with the protection potion active

sword_confrontation.title: Sword Confrontation
story: Confronting the shadowy figure with the enchanted sword, a fierce battle ensues.
The clash of magic and steel echoes through the chamber as you strive to break the curse.

potion_confrontation.title: Potion Confrontation
story: Confronting the shadowy figure with the protection potion active, the battle is intense.
The shield deflects dark energy, giving you the opportunity to weaken the curse's hold.

options.text: Seize the moment and press on

victory_achieved.title: Victory Achieved
story: With determination and skill, you weaken the curse's grip on the princess and the kingdom.
The shadowy figure dissolves into the air, and the cursed artifact shatters.
The kingdom is saved, and the princess is free from the ancient curse.
You are hailed as a hero, and the people rejoice in the newfound peace.

options.text: Celebrate the victory with the princess

happily_ever_after.title: Happily Ever After
story: With the curse broken, the kingdom flourishes, and the princess expresses her gratitude.
You and the princess share a deep bond, and together you rule the kingdom with wisdom and love.
The people sing songs of your triumph, and your tale becomes a legendary story of love and bravery.
Congratulations! You have achieved a truly 'Happily Ever After.'

end_peaceful_life.title: A Peaceful Life
story: Choosing a peaceful life, you decide to decline the quest and live in tranquility.
The kingdom faces challenges, but you find contentment in the simplicity of everyday life.
Though you never became a legendary hero, your choices led to a peaceful existence.
